summary:
Sailing Protocol - The first step in building the world economic platform is bringing stocks on-chain. A small step for the Sailing Protocol, a huge step for humanity.

 Sailing Labs - Sailing Labs is a research and development organization focused on economics. We are a special research lab. We bring our top research to market with the Sailing Protocol. The Sailing Protocol brings the world economy on-chain, builds infrastructure to improve the economy, and products that facilitate using this infrastructure. We believe that, over time, the Sailing Protocol will play a bigger role as the platform for the world economy.
